jobDescription: Only local San Francisco Bay Area candidates!  Direct W2 employees only! No 3rd party agency!  Coordinate with IT and Records Management System vendor on implementing enhancements, bug fixes.  Analyze and reconcile data discrepancies for box status and metadata compared with vendor data and source data from migration.  Analyze and resolve Datasafe and Iron Mountain transaction integration issues.  Reconcile Records Retention Schedule changes in FileTrail Records Manager System. Map and apply new record series to existing boxes by reviewing the metadata about box contents.  Oversee offsite records disposition process. Review candidate records for disposition, coordinate with record owners, Tax, Legal, offsite storage vendor, maintain certificates of destruction and other records documenting review and approval. Configure the FileTrail Records Manager System as needed, e.g., add new warehouses, map and add or update fields for migrated data, etc.  Manage records, their metadata, and their transfer during acquisitions and divestitures.  Document various records management procedures.  Skills:  7 years plus experience as Data Analyst. Extensive experience with Data mapping, data migration and data reconciliation.  Superior ability to document procedures.  Superior ability to coordinate with IT and vendors.  Demonstrated successful experience data analysis, mapping and reconciliation.  Correctly match records to series detailed in retention schedules.  Desired skills:  Experience working with frontend and backend of Records Management Systems strongly preferred Records Management experience strongly preferred.  Certified Records Manager (CRM) preferred.  Work experience in a biotech pharmaceutical or other regulated industry preferred.
